member.name: MFVideoRotationFormat
member.summary: Describes the rotation of the video image in the counter-clockwise direction.

member.name: MFVideoRotationFormat.MFVideoRotationFormat_90
member.summary: The image is rotated 90 degrees counter-clockwise.

member.name: MFVideoRotationFormat.MFVideoRotationFormat_270
member.summary: The image is rotated 270 degrees counter-clockwise.
